title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 68/97 of 16 January 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 2805/95 fixing the export refunds in the wine sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 68/97 of 16 January 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 2805/95 fixing the export refunds in the wine sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EC) No 2805/95 is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 17 January 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 January 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
